name: Space Charmer
description:
Earth is in ruins, and they have sent a group of people to find another planet to inhabit. You are a flute player, put on the ship to carry the torch for what little culture they could send. When finally land on a planet that won't kill you, though, there are already natives there, and they do not like you. At least, until they hear you play some of your sweet melodies. Now the leading diplomat, your decisions and music will determine whether you and the rest of humanity will live or die.  Good Luck!

Made for Music Game Jam  2018
